name: muhammedsiyadp

top_projects.name: pure-pursuit-controller-movebase
top_projects.description: pure pursuit controller implementation for ros1 movebase

muhammedsiyadp/water-level-controller.summary: Recent updates include the implementation of manual start feature, starter functionality, and LED functionality. EEPROM save and retrieval have also been added, along with test improvements and improved comments.

muhammedsiyadp/bellmaster.summary: Recent updates include the addition of timings, RTC, and EEPROM save features. Multi and dual WiFi functionalities have also been added, along with a server and NTP integration. Hotspot functionality has also been implemented.

muhammedsiyadp/bell-master.summary: A recent test was performed to ensure the repository's functionality and features are working correctly.

profile_summary:
Muhammedsiyadp is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong foundation in programming languages, including Python and C++. With a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions, Muhammedsiyadp has established a reputation as a reliable and innovative technology expert. A dedicated contributor to the open-source community, Muhammedsiyadp has actively developed and maintained 12 public repositories, showcasing a deep understanding of software development and a commitment to collaborative knowledge-sharing.

As a proficient developer with a growing professional network, Muhammedsiyadp has earned the respect and admiration of peers, with 5 followers acknowledging expertise and technical authority. With a unique blend of technical skills and collaborative spirit, Muhammedsiyadp is poised to drive innovation and deliver exceptional results in a rapidly evolving tech landscape. By leveraging industry-relevant expertise and staying at the forefront of programming trends, Muhammedsiyadp continues to push boundaries and advance the field of software development.
